lines.text: Vultures - waiting for your bodies! What a meal Steve would make!
The diamonds are in here. Take them - and give me water.
[Rand shakes his head no]
Take me...

[Looking at a disheveled Diana]
The paint's all peeled off - there's nothing tempting about you now -...
Listen, Good-looking - why don't you use a little reason? Guide us out of here - - and we'll split the diamonds with you - - Once out of here - I may even - - drop Steve.
The diamonds are mine - and you'll be mine when I want you.

[after a desperate Diana threatens to drink salt water]
It's a slow death - and the vultures won't wait till life has left your body!

[after reading telegram]
A woman from home! Haven't seen a white woman in years.
Don't expect too much. No beauty would come to this desolate hole.
[Takes the telegram]
I bet she's an old maid - bow-legged and cross-eyed!

[Overcome by Diana's beauty]
Three years away from the world - - a man almost forgets there are women like you...
Free me and I'll free you.
What?
From Steve.

[to Diana]
Play the game with me - diamonds and youth - - the world is ours!

[to Hugh]
I'll be your slave - only give me water - water!

[referring to the hyenas]
They'll eat everything but the buckle on your belt.
Nothing but desert and burning sun. How do you endure it?
Would you like to see some diamonds in the rough?
Careful - Good-looking!
Hello, Good-looking - how are you enjoying the hunting trip?
As a hostess, you're a pretty slick crook - *Lady* Diana!
The blacks have deserted! Rand knows this desert - he's got to get us out of here! You can make him do it!
You fool! You've made a mess of things! Now you want to use me!
Nothing but sun and sand! Are we ever going to reach water?
I've drawn the last from the barrel! If you're a good girl, I'll give you a swallow when we camp!
Buck up, you brave diamond thief! There's sure to be water over that hill!
